snippet: The Preservation Hall Jazz Band celebrated the New Orleans hall’s 50th anniversary at Carnegie Hall on Saturday night.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performance by the Preservation Hall Jazz Band at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Preservation Hall Jazz Band celebrated the New Orleans hall’s 50th anniversary at Carnegie Hall on Saturday night.

headline.seo: Preservation Hall Jazz Band at Carnegie Hall - Review
headline.main: In Tribute to New Orleans Institution, Baton Is Passed to New Fans
